definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
mountain resort/Qing imperial summer residence at Chengde, a world heritage site
Mountain Villa with Embracing Beauty in Suzhou, Jiangsu

sentences.english: I'd love to see Ingleside again.
sentences.chinese: 我很想再看一次壁爐山莊。

sentences.english: We were invited to Mr. Davidson's residence in Beverley Hills.
sentences.chinese: 我們受邀到戴維森先生去比佛利山莊的住所。

sentences.english: Tonight, stay in 3-star Xiyu Yongsheng Hotel or equivalent.
sentences.chinese: 今晚，住宿於桃園山莊或同級3星酒店。

sentences.english: The pair married in 2008 at their Beverly Hills estate.
sentences.chinese: 這對佳偶於2008年在她們的貝弗利山莊別墅完婚。

sentences.english: The revenue the village receives from visitors is far less than that.
sentences.chinese: 而山莊從遊客身上獲得的收入遠遠少於這些開支。

sentences.english: Heathcliff overhears and runs away from Wuthering Heights. Ch 9
sentences.chinese: 希斯克裏夫無意間聽到，於是從呼嘯山莊離家出走。

sentences.english: Heathcliff was the well-known revenger in the novel Wuthering Heights written by Emily Bronte.
sentences.chinese: 勃郎特小說《呼嘯山莊》中衆所周知的一位復仇者。

sentences.english: What do you think makes Beverly Hills a unique shopping place?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得什麼讓比佛利山莊成了獨特的購物去處呢？

sentences.english: One day when we were walking in the Grange garden, I noticed her crying.
sentences.chinese: 有一天我們在山莊花園散步時我看到她哭了。

sentences.english: Washington longed to retire to his fields at Mount Vernon.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓希望能夠解甲歸田，在弗農山莊安享晚年。

sentences.english: From Beverly Hills it takes me twenty minutes because of the traffic.
sentences.chinese: 從比佛利山莊過來大概要二十分鐘，因爲交通的關係。

sentences.english: Reluctantly, Ellen agrees to accompany her to Wuthering Heights the next day.
sentences.chinese: 艾倫不情願地答應第二天陪小凱西去呼嘯山莊。

sentences.english: The Summer Resort is vast and magnificent, which reflects the broad-minded ideals of Emperor Kangxi and Emperor Qianlong.
sentences.chinese: 避暑山莊園林宏偉闊大，體現了康乾兩帝的寬闊胸懷。

sentences.english: It can be said that The Xielu Villa can be a window to display the Lingnan culture.
sentences.chinese: 可以說，謝魯山莊開啓的是一扇展示嶺南文化的窗口。

sentences.english: Villa-yin Tourism Scenic Spot is located in Belvedere, Changping Town, Dongguan City.
sentences.chinese: 東莞麗城隱賢山莊旅遊風景區位於東莞市常平鎮麗城。

definition: Diaoyu Islands, located between Taiwan and Okinawa, controlled by Japan – which calls them the Senkaku Islands – but claimed by China as part of its territory
farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang
Longfeng district of Daqing city 大慶|大庆[Da4 qing4], Heilongjiang
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
Changbai or Baekdu mountains 白頭山|白头山, volcanic mountain range between Jilin province and North Korea, prominent in Manchu and Korean mythology
aquatic/produced in sea, rivers or lakes
Dongshan county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian/Tungshan township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
